languages.text: "Однако мы проводим черту, если в прошлом пустотника был хотя бы намек на подлинную ересь". {n}Вигдис поднимает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Вы же понимаете, о чем я. И контрабанда, и ложное культопоклонничество — ереси в глазах закона, ибо преступают слово Его, однако одно, прямо говоря, намного опаснее другого".

"We do draw a line, however, at even a whisper of genuine heresy in a voidfarer's past." {n}Vigdis raises her gaze to you.{/n} "I'm sure you realise, Lord Captain, that smuggling and false cultism are both heresies in the eyes of the law, for they transgress His word, but one is far more dangerous than the other, to put it bluntly."
languages.original_text: "Однако мы проводим черту, если в прошлом пустотника был хотя бы намек на подлинную ересь". {n}Вигдис поднимает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Вы же понимаете, о чем я. И контрабанда, и ложное культопоклонничество — ереси в глазах закона, ибо преступают слово Его, однако одно, прямо говоря, намного опаснее другого".

traits.locale_text: "We do draw a line, however, at even a whisper of genuine heresy in a voidfarer's past." {n}Vigdis raises her gaze to you.{/n} "You know what I mean, don't you? Smuggling and false cultism are both heresies in the eyes of the law, for they transgress His word, but one is far more dangerous than the other, to put it bluntly."

"We do draw a line, however, at even a whisper of genuine heresy in a voidfarer's past." {n}Vigdis raises her gaze to you.{/n} "You know what I mean, don't you? Smuggling and false cultism are both heresies in the eyes of the law, for they transgress His word, but one is far more dangerous than the other, to put it bluntly."

"We do draw a line, however, at even a whisper of genuine heresy in a voidfarer's past." {n}Vigdis raises her gaze to you.{/n} "You know what I mean, don't you? Smuggling and false cultism are both heresies in the eyes of the law, for they transgress His word, but one is far more dangerous than the other, to put it bluntly."

"We do draw a line, however, at even a whisper of genuine heresy in a voidfarer's past." {n}Vigdis raises her gaze to you.{/n} "I'm sure you realise, Lord Captain, that smuggling and false cultism are both heresies in the eyes of the law, for they transgress His word, but one is far more dangerous than the other, to put it bluntly."

"We do draw a line, however, at even a whisper of genuine heresy in a voidfarer's past." {n}Vigdis raises her gaze to you.{/n} "I'm sure you realise, Lord Captain, that smuggling and false cultism are both heresies in the eyes of the law, for they transgress His word, but one is far more dangerous than the other, to put it bluntly."

languages.text: 「ですが私たちは、たとえ噂話の域であっても、虚空渡りの過去に真の異端が含まれている場合には、必ず一線を引きます」{n}ヴィグディスはあなたを見上げた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、おわかりかと思いますが、密輸も偽装された異端信仰も、いずれも法の目から見れば異端、すなわち、聖なる御言葉への背反です。しかし、率直に言って、片方はもう一方より遥かに危険です」
languages.original_text: "We do draw a line, however, at even a whisper of genuine heresy in a voidfarer's past." {n}Vigdis raises her gaze to you.{/n} "I'm sure you realise, Lord Captain, that smuggling and false cultism are both heresies in the eyes of the law, for they transgress His word, but one is far more dangerous than the other, to put it bluntly."

traits.locale_text: 「ですが私たちは、たとえ噂話の域であっても、虚空渡りの過去に真の異端が含まれている場合には、必ず一線を引きます」{n}ヴィグディスはあなたを見上げた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、おわかりかと思いますが、密輸も偽装された異端信仰も、いずれも法の目から見れば異端、すなわち、聖なる御言葉への背反です。しかし、率直に言って、片方はもう一方より遥かに危険です」

languages.text: "Tabii bir noktada buna bir çizgi çekiyor ve geçmişinde kâfirliğe dair en ufak söylentiler bile olan tayfaları eliyoruz." {n}Vigdis bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "O'nun sözlerini çiğnediklerinden dolayı kaçakçılığın da sahte tarikatçılığın da kanunlar nezdinde kâfirlik olduğunu biliyorsunuz Lord Kaptan. Tabii bunların tehlike derecesi aynı değil."
languages.original_text: "We do draw a line, however, at even a whisper of genuine heresy in a voidfarer's past." {n}Vigdis raises her gaze to you.{/n} "I'm sure you realise, Lord Captain, that smuggling and false cultism are both heresies in the eyes of the law, for they transgress His word, but one is far more dangerous than the other, to put it bluntly."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii bir noktada buna bir çizgi çekiyor ve geçmişinde kâfirliğe dair en ufak söylentiler bile olan gemicileri eliyoruz."{n}Vigdis bakışlarını sana çevirir.{/n} "O'nun sözlerini çiğnediklerinden dolayı kaçakçılığın da sahte tarikatçılığın da kanunlar nezdinde kâfirlik olduğunun siz de farkındasınızdır Lord Kaptan. Lakin açıkça söylemek gerekirse bunlardan biri, diğerinden çok daha tehlikelidir elbette."

languages.text: «Sin embargo, sí que rechazamos el más mínimo atisbo de herejía real en el pasado de un infante del vacío». {n}Vigdis levanta la mirada.{/n} «Lord Capitán, no me cabe duda de que sabe que tanto el contrabando como los falsos cultos son herejías ante la ley, pues ambas cosas van contra Su palabra, pero, perdone mi franqueza, una de las dos actividades es mucho más peligrosa».
languages.original_text: "We do draw a line, however, at even a whisper of genuine heresy in a voidfarer's past." {n}Vigdis raises her gaze to you.{/n} "I'm sure you realise, Lord Captain, that smuggling and false cultism are both heresies in the eyes of the law, for they transgress His word, but one is far more dangerous than the other, to put it bluntly."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, sí que rechazamos el más mínimo atisbo de herejía real en el pasado de un infante del vacío». {n}Vigdis levanta la mirada.{/n} «Lord Capitán, no me cabe duda de que sabe que tanto el contrabando como los falsos cultos son herejías ante la ley, pues ambas cosas van contra Su palabra, pero, perdone mi franqueza, una de las dos actividades es mucho más peligrosa».

languages.text: “不过，我们也是有红线的。一旦船员与真正的异端恶行有染，哪怕只有一丁点，我们也会划清界限。”{n}维格迪斯仰起头，看着你。{/n}“我相信您能理解，舰长大人。尽管从法律的角度来看，走私与异端邪说都属于违法行为，因为它们都违反了神皇的律法，但老实说，其中还是有孰重孰轻之分的。”
languages.original_text: "We do draw a line, however, at even a whisper of genuine heresy in a voidfarer's past." {n}Vigdis raises her gaze to you.{/n} "I'm sure you realise, Lord Captain, that smuggling and false cultism are both heresies in the eyes of the law, for they transgress His word, but one is far more dangerous than the other, to put it bluntly."

traits.locale_text: “不过，我们也是有红线的。一旦船员与真正的异端恶行有染，哪怕只有一丁点，我们也会划清界限。”{n}维格迪斯仰起头，看着你。{/n}“我相信您能理解，舰长大人。尽管从法律的角度来看，走私与异端邪说都属于违法行为，因为它们都违反了神皇的律法，但老实说，其中还是有孰重孰轻之分的。”

languages.text: « Mais nous avons des limites : nous disqualifions un candidat si nous avons ouï-dire du moindre soupçon de véritable hérésie, {n}ajoute Vigdis en plongeant son regard dans le vôtre.{/n} {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je suis certaine que vous avez conscience que la contrebande et le parjure sont toutes deux des formes d'hérésie qui transgressent Sa parole, mais, en toute franchise, l'une est bien plus dangereuse que l'autre. »
languages.original_text: "We do draw a line, however, at even a whisper of genuine heresy in a voidfarer's past." {n}Vigdis raises her gaze to you.{/n} "I'm sure you realise, Lord Captain, that smuggling and false cultism are both heresies in the eyes of the law, for they transgress His word, but one is far more dangerous than the other, to put it bluntly."

traits.locale_text: « Mais nous avons des limites : nous disqualifions un candidat si nous avons ouï-dire du moindre soupçon de véritable hérésie, {n}ajoute Vigdis en plongeant son regard dans le vôtre.{/n} {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je suis certaine que vous avez conscience que la contrebande et le parjure sont toutes deux des formes d'hérésie qui transgressent Sa parole, mais, en toute franchise, l'une est bien plus dangereuse que l'autre. »

languages.text: "Wir ziehen allerdings eine Linie, was tatsächliche Ketzerei in der Vergangenheit eines Raumfahrers angeht." {n}Vigdis sieht dich an.{/n} "Euch ist gewiss klar, Lord Captain, dass Schmuggel und falsche Kulte in den Augen des Gesetzes als Ketzerei gelten, da beides Sein Wort schmäht, dabei ist ein Vergehen weitaus gefährlicher als das andere."
languages.original_text: "We do draw a line, however, at even a whisper of genuine heresy in a voidfarer's past." {n}Vigdis raises her gaze to you.{/n} "I'm sure you realise, Lord Captain, that smuggling and false cultism are both heresies in the eyes of the law, for they transgress His word, but one is far more dangerous than the other, to put it bluntly."

traits.locale_text: "Wir ziehen allerdings eine Linie, was tatsächliche Ketzerei in der Vergangenheit eines Raumfahrers angeht." {n}Vigdis sieht dich an.{/n} "Euch ist gewiss klar, Lord Captain, dass Schmuggel und falsche Kulte in den Augen des Gesetzes als Ketzerei gelten, da beides Sein Wort schmäht, dabei ist ein Vergehen weitaus gefährlicher als das andere."
